channel.title: Marianne Faithfull on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Marianne Faithfull on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Broken English’ Review: An Imaginative, Fittingly Eccentric Documentary Pays Starry Tribute to Marianne Faithfull
item.description: Playing out of competition in Venice, writer-directors Iain Forsyth and Jane Pollard call on the likes of Tilda Swinton, Courtney Love and George MacKay to honor the British singer-songwriter.

item.title: ‘Broken English’ Review: An Imaginative, Fittingly Eccentric Documentary Pays Starry Tribute to Marianne Faithfull
item.description: Playing out of competition in Venice, writer-directors Iain Forsyth and Jane Pollard call on the likes of Tilda Swinton, Courtney Love and George MacKay to honor the British singer-songwriter.

item.title: Marianne Faithfull Doc ‘Broken English’ Acquired by Italy’s I Wonder Pictures Ahead of Venice World Premiere (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Italian distribution company I Wonder Pictures has acquired rights to Venice-bound “Broken English,” a portrait of the late Marianne Faithfull directed by BAFTA nominees Iain Forsyth and Jane Pollard
